alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:36AM EST until February 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Butler, Muhlenberg and Ohio Counties. .Heavy rain from the past week have caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 37.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 AM CST Monday was 37.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 32.7 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.2 feet on 02/24/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tonight.
